summary: E-commerce platform with product management and batch upload functionality
architectural_notes: Product management system with batch image upload capability
known_issues: Stripe settings not visible in user panel
Admin access needs to be granted on live page

existing_features.title: Display Stripe settings section in the user account dashboard (AccountDashboardPage) with a navigation card that links to the payment settings page, similar to the existing Product Management card

new_feature_requests.summary: Batch upload for products with editable name, description, and price
Grant admin privileges to the current authenticated user on the live production deployment so they can access admin features including Stripe configuration

projectName: Show Stripe settings in user panel and grant admin access
